title: 'This product is of high quality and has a long lifespan.'
body: 'I bought this product to organize my files and I am satisfied with it. It has 13 columns that are separated by flags. The flags are useful for labeling the columns and finding the files you need quickly. The product has a professional color and a sturdy material. The only improvement I would suggest is adding a handle on the top so you can carry it easily. It is a good product for the price.'

title: Good but could've been bigger.
body: Product description should be updated. It's grey in colour, like the picture. Coming to the folder itself, it works well and will fit A4 size papers. Perfect for students to keep all their printed notes in one place.
